elements.name: Auftrag
elements.title: Politically right-wing parties believe that the state should have the right to massively restrict personal freedoms if it is pursuing a preservative interest.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Look up the word "bewahren" in the dictionary and decide in which of the following four statements the word is used in the sense of the politically right-wing parties.
choices: In the event of danger, please remain calm.
I would like to keep this belief in the good old virtues such as decency and discipline (= would like to maintain or preserve).
He saved me from doing something really stupid.
I keep my jewelry in a chest.
elements.correctAnswer: I would like to keep this belief in the good old virtues such as decency and discipline (= would like to maintain or preserve).

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Explain briefly and precisely what preserving interest lies behind each of the following two concerns:

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: The state should ban the construction of mosques because Switzerland is and should remain a Christian society.
elements.correctAnswer:
Possible solution: 
Although Switzerland is becoming more and more religiously diverse, a previous state of affairs should be preserved = conserved from the point of view of the politically right-wing parties. This is why this attitude is also referred to as conservative.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Weed is a drug that is not part of our culture. Alcohol is a stimulant that has been part of our culture for centuries. This is one of the reasons why the state should ban weed.
elements.correctAnswer:
Possible solution: 
The politically right-wing parties want to preserve their traditional understanding of drugs (weed is a drug, alcohol is a stimulant).
